titleStmt.title: An act granting to their Majesties the rate of one penny per pound upon all the real and personal estates within this province of New-York, &c. to be allowed unto His Excellency the governour, for the care of the province, November the 12th, 1692.
titleStmt.author: New York (State)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
